short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds some extra features to Studentweb.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to enhance the user experience on the "Resultater" page of the Norwegian student web portal, FSweb. By automating the process of calculating your average grade, this extension saves you valuable time and energy. The average grade calculation is based on the sum of all selected grades divided by the total number of eligible study points. The extension also excludes courses that have been passed without a letter grade, ensuring that the calculation is accurate and reliable. The result is displayed in a user-friendly format, making it easy to understand and interpret. 

Overall, this extension is a must-have tool for any student looking to streamline their academic performance tracking on FSweb.
